                                                                                                      # 10.Spirng MVC çš„å¼‚å¸¸å¤„ç†ï¼Ÿ

    /**
     * è§£æå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œè½¬æ¢æˆå¯¹åº”çš„ ModelAndView ç»“æœ

    ModelAndView resolveException(
            HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, @Nullable Object handler, Exception ex);

}
